name: The Wanderer (itch) (Seiruzan)
description:
This game is also available FREE on Steam with achievements.

Life is on the brink of extinction, what horrible circumstances have led to this?

You're a little robot, programmed to wander alone. What purpose do you serve? Why has the world come to this point? The Wanderer is an exploration focused game full of discoveries; the consequences of greed, and taking fate into your own hands.

To whoever chooses to play The Wanderer: Thank you! This game is built to be played at your own pace, take your time and look around. I truly hope you enjoy the little experience I've put together!

The soundtrack is also available for purchase. If you enjoyed the music and want to own it yourself or simply wanna throw some money at me please consider buying the OST!
